attributes.action: Act upon Ncsoft who ban regular players in favour of bots
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the EULA for playing lineage 2, it clearly states that anyone caught botting in the game will be banned. They do ban regular players and more often than not for no reason what so ever BUT regular bots are consistantly active to farm adena which is sold by websites for actual money which is illegal and breaches there own EULA and costing players millions every year. Some 40% of players are reckoned to be bots and Ncsoft are aware of this but appear to be doing nothing.

THIS IS FRAUD.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
